tours.title: Magnificent Golden Triangle
tours.description: Discover India’s diverse culture, landscapes, and history.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.details: Arrive in Delhi, transfer to hotel. Evening free for leisure.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Red Fort, India Gate, Qutub Minar and Chandni Chowk.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.details: Drive to Agra. Visit Agra Fort and see the Taj Mahal at sunset.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri
itinerary.details: Stop at Fatehpur Sikri, then continue to Jaipur.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Amber Fort, City Palace, Jantar Mantar and Hawa Mahal.

itinerary.title: Jaipur – Delhi
itinerary.details: Return drive to Delhi, evening free for shopping or leisure.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details: Transfer to airport for onward journey.

tours.description: Visit iconic cities like Paris, Rome, and Barcelona, with art, history, and cuisine.

tours.title: Taj Mahal Experience

tours.title: Wildlife Adventure
tours.description: Explore India's top national parks and wildlife sanctuaries.

tours.description: Experience spiritual India in Varanasi and Rishikesh.

tours.description: Discover India's culinary heritage in Delhi and Jaipur.

tours.description: Join the festivities of Holi and Diwali in India.

tours.title: Textile Tour
tours.description: Visit artisan workshops and shop for unique fabrics.

tours.title: Photography Tour

tours.description: Rejuvenate with Ayurveda and yoga in Kerala.

tours.description: Experience the spiritual and architectural wonders of Khajuraho and Varanasi along with the Golden Triangle.

tours.description: A journey through India's rich heritage, including UNESCO sites, ancient temples, and vibrant cities.

tours.description: Relax on the beaches of Goa, enjoy water sports, and explore Portuguese heritage in this tropical paradise.

tours.description: Combine sightseeing in Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur with rejuvenating yoga sessions and wellness experiences.
